comment.body: 人才,资金,技术三断流.土共能不急吗
@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: well,how about benchmark ZN for fine tune ,btw, I am running ZN with pypy3  on  a vps with only 2G ram in total and used about no more than 1G by ZN
@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: such as threads , CPU usage under high I/O, cache,etc,I think ZN is a great project, and there will be a lot to fine tune.
